verbs.description: [V: Reacting] [ARGM-LOC: on Thursday morning ’s CNN Newsroom] [ARG1: to Samantha Bee ’s jumbled apology the night prior for calling First Daughter Ivanka Trump the c - word] , [ARG0: CNN political commentator and HLN host S.E. Cupp] took Bee to task for her apology being “ couched in like a dozen different codicils ” and , worst of all , “ virtue - signaling ” without a heartfelt apology to Ivanka herself .
